transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Heart Seeker
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000035_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000035_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Bloody Roar
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the enemy with the highest Speed for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> while ignoring Resilience, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Pureblood's Dominion</color> to all allies at the start of battle. These effects cannot be removed.\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the enemy with the highest Speed for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000035_2_4] turn(s)</color> while ignoring Resilience, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Pureblood's Dominion</color> to all allies at the start of battle. These effects cannot be removed.\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000035_2_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000035_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Pure Blood Archdemon
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: When using this skill, removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from all enemies, then attacks them. Deals increased damage and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color> if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.
description: When using this skill, removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000035_3_3]</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from all enemies, then attacks them. Deals increased damage and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000035_3_2] turn(s)</color> if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict Bleeding on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000035_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Bleeding on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000035_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000035_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000035_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
